positions.position:
Splunk SOC Onboarding Engineer
(Security Operations Centre)
summary: Managing the process of onboarding security logs from internal applications running multiple different technologies to the Splunk.
Experience with onboarding security logs of MS WIN, RHEL, AIX, Solaris, MSSQL, Oracle DB, PostgreSQL, Azure, AWS, MS IIS, Cisco, SalesForce, IBM SVC, and custom vendor appliances
highlights: Having full responsibility over the complete onboarding process of an application onboarding from gathering configuration items scope to onboarding process itself and proper documentation of the full process
Working in a strictly confidential and process driven environment of big pharma
Onboarding technologies via Universal Forwarder, syslog, API and custom Python scripts
Working with Splunk's configuration files, creating custom indexes/sourcetypes, modifying parsing and transformation rules
Managed process of updating all custom applications from Python 2 to Python 3
Developed several custom Splunk dashboards to give an overview of current onboarding status
Daily experience with Splunk's SPL, SNOW, JIRA and Confluence

summary:
During Q2 & Q3 of 2020 I've worked as React Front End Project Lead for client Linde where I was developing multiple industrial operations dashboards.
Both projects included multiple custom visualization dashboards using Plotly.js and Recharts libraries.

I've been working as Splunk Developer for several huge clients from automotive industry.
Most of the time I've been working with JavaScript developing custom Splunk applications and custom Splunk visualisations on those dashboards.

I've been also debugging and creating multiple SPL queries and even creating multiple Custom Search Commands in Python for highly complex computations like cosine distance, correlation matrix etc.
On top of that, I've also developed Splunk Reporting application that takes series of Splunk queries and generates ISO 50001 compliant PDF and DOCX report for management.
highlights: I've worked as React Front End Project Lead on two projects for Linde
60% Front End Modern ES6+ Javascript + SplunkJS (Developing Splunk's apps)
30% Splunk Search and Configuration
10% Splunk Python's (Custom search commands)
Long term project of tracking key production statistics of upcoming electric vehicles
Long term project of IT tickets tracking app using custom force directed visualization for leader in automotive industry
Continously worked on Splunk's app development focused on energetic management following ISO 50001 standard

summary: Self-funded limited liability company for any smaller clients and my project ideas I've been working on in my free time including multiple multi-platform PWA apps, online shops, websites, online marketing, social media marketing and more.
One of the notable apps I've created is WOD Time Calculator.
highlights: Since 2012 self employed enterpreuner, in 11/2018 switched to Limited Liability Company
Web apps in Vue.js, React and MongoDB
Blogs in Jekyll or Wordpress
Online shops in PrestaShop and WooCommerce
Online shop created in React for local farm delivery
iOS apps in Swift
Android apps in Java/Kotlin
Online marketing - focus on content marketing and newsletters
Social media marketing - focus on Instagram and Facebook sales boosts

summary: After years of working on my own I accepted offer for full-time software developer job to learn to work with team and find out more about new technologies
highlights: Learned about JavaScript testing with Jest and Mocha
Greatly improved my git skills
Worked on a few internal Node.js apps
Build CI/CD in GitLab for internal apps
Experienced working with Jenkins, React, GraphQL, SCSS, Pug and more
Learned to use several frameworks in Python like Behave and Selenium
Worked on end-to-end tests integration for antivirus leader in Python

summary:
Long term project based work where I have been part of rating team and later QA team for dozens of different projects ranging from evaluating search results to improving voice commands of smart devices.
Very flexible part-time fully remote search evaluator to fill times in between projects.
highlights: Managing work of Czech raters for transcription, voice commands and word categorization projects
Improving search results of one of the leading search engines
Evaluating automated translations
Evaluating pages quality and helping to identify malevolent websites
